ast.name: TouchInvaders 2
ast.comment:
#pilvu2

I found a way to do a touch and hold event, but had to code it a different way as the touch sprite event doesn't allow for this at present. So you can now hold down the left and right buttons to move. I also added shields to make it a little easier on the first wave.

With Peli's help we have implemented the first sprite animations into touchdevelop. I've also added sound effects and the ability to just touch to the left or right of the space base and it will move towards your finger.

body.text: Set the wall background to black & foreground text to white for when the high score table is displayed at the end

thenBody.text: Checks if user press LEFT, RIGHT or SHOOT buttons and responds accordingly

elseBody.text: If the player touches the game board move the player's base depending on whether he touches to the left or right of it

thenBody.text: Move the player base using tilt controls if Boolean TILT ON is set to TRUE
Check if the user base hits the left hand side of the screen & stop it from going out
Check if the user base hits the right hand side of the screen and stop it from going out
If rocket leaves the screen reset it

body.text: This creates rows and columns of alien invaders
This creates rows and columns of shields using rectangles
This moves the aliens left and right and then down when they hit either side.
Check if alien rocket hits user controlled base
Check if the alien rocket has left the game board & hide it if it has
Check if alien rocket hits the shields and remove the shield if it does
If alien rocket is NOT being fired & the alien ship is above user base, then fire it
Check if Alien is hit by the rocket from the user base
If all the aliens have been destroyed spawn a new wave of them
